message.body: Hey Noah. Its Leilani. Are you interested / free to work on a shoot 18-22. Low budget. Light work.

Hey leilani I'll actually be down in rehobeth beach production designing a feature from this Sunday til mid-Dec. I have someone I could recommend though! Taryn Jones, she was the prop master on the Alexandria Xmas thing
Haha thanks for contacting me! Keep me in mind for anything after Dec. I'll email you her contact now
Thanks so much. Hope to work with you soon!
No prob! Good luck on the shoot!
